### Tender for the Supply and Delivery of Optical Components

#### Tender Details

| Details | English | French |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS4233639975 | N° de référence : WS4233639975 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4233639975 | N° de Sollicitation : WS4233639975 |
| Publication Date | January 16, 2024 | Date de publication :  16 janvier 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | February 7, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST | Date limite de soumission : 7 février 2024 à 14h00 (HE) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | November 30, 2023 | Date de début prévue du contrat : 30 novembre 2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | N/A | Date de fin prévue du contrat : sans objet |

#### Tender Overview

The Government of Canada invites proposals from qualified suppliers to provide and deliver two (2) Borescope Kits, complete with Handset, Optical tips, two (2) batteries, insertion tube gripper, chargers, HDMI cords, software, rigidizer, handset hands-free hook, handset holder, swivel ball and C-clamp, along with a Hard Transit Case with Telescoping and Cleaning Kits.

#### Key Requirements

* The bid must include all required components and accessories as listed in the tender description.
* Suppliers are required to comply with Canadian trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The tender is open to all qualified suppliers, and bids will be evaluated based on the criteria of Lowest Price.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or requests for a debriefing, please contact:

* Trisha Doucette, Contracting Authority
* Email: trisha.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18529927?extsite=MTg1Mjk5MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Phone: Not provided
* Fax: Not provided

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents and specifications can be downloaded from the above website. 

Please ensure to review the tender documents carefully and submit your bid before the tender closing date and time. Only bids received before the deadline will be considered.
